essay_data.topic_prompt: Imagine you were surfing with your friend and a tsunami started to form. If you knew a tsunami was forming like the video, what would you do first? Write a paragraph with two reasons to support your answer.
essay_data.submit_text: I will move to a higher ground. I have two reasons. First, Because tsunamis are dangerous. Because tsunamis can sweep us away. Second, tsunamis are big waves. But it can't come at the high ground. For these reasons, I will move to a higher ground.

corrections.highlight: I will move to a higher ground.
corrections.correction: I will move to higher ground.

corrections.highlight: But it can't come at the high ground.
corrections.correction: They can't reach higher ground.

sample_metadata.topic_prompt: Imagine you were surfing with your friend and a tsunami started to form. If you knew a tsunami was forming like the video, what would you do first? Write a paragraph with two reasons to support your answer.
sample_metadata.submit_text: I will move to a higher ground. I have two reasons. First, Because tsunamis are dangerous. Because tsunamis can sweep us away. Second, tsunamis are big waves. But it can't come at the high ground. For these reasons, I will move to a higher ground.
